text: kavurun dænumak nomætiva modakamin tamange daruvanva mara dæmuvoda ovunda, ovunta allah tamanta (aharayata gænimata) laba di tibunu (honda) dæya (anumata nætæyi) allah mata boru gota valakva dæmuvoda ovunda, niyata vasayenma paduvak at kara gatha. (ebævin) ovun niyata vasayenma napuru margayehima giyaha. rju margayehi giya aya novannaha
